channel.title: How do i make item in inventory
channel.description: Im using testscape and i wanna know how to make items apear in inventory can you guys tell me how in "simple" steps cuz im new.

item.title: How do i make item in inventory
item.dc:creator: @KingCjownz KingCjownz
item.description:
@KingCjownz wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:4, topic:72840”][quote author=KingCjownz link=topic=107051.msg1072903#msg1072903 date=1175411810]
talking about ::pickup 0995 1000?
look for item ids and look up item get the ip and type this
::pickup (item id) (how much you want)
if thats wat u talking about…
[/quote]
that to put it in your inventory or use ::item #### to spawn it on the floor.[/quote]
yes and theres that too lol same thing goes u just need item id and you type ::item (item ip)
and like dell said it spawns on the floor and you pick it up.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make item in inventory
